attributes.action: Take ALL legal actions to GUARANTEE that no UK taxpayer pounds are expended over British jihadist deaths in the ME.
attributes.additional_details: British subjects who travel to foreign wars and get killed are outside the scope of the protection of the UK taxpayer.  IT MUST BE that absolutely NO foreign office activity which puts a cost on the UK taxpayer MUST BE UNDERTAKEN. If the families want answers then IT MUST BE THAT THOSE FAMILIES BEAR THE FULL COST OF THOSE ACTIVITIES.
